Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. I believe it could be a great addition to your collection or needs. Given its quality and benefits, I would like to propose a price of $200 for this item. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique value and features it offers. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Looking forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
